channel.title: I wouldapreciate help with setting envirment variables or w/e u call em
channel.description: hey, i uninstalled java some time ago an never had a need for installing it again until now. i'm bored and i feel like running a server for a while. anyways, i went on java's site and got confused, i ended up downloading some thing "netbeans" some java thing.. lol and whenever i try to comipe the server it says "please install java" and i thought i did O_o i got netbeans from java... w/e if someone can just tell me which one to install, i'd be pretty happy indeed :] oh yea, and about the variables... well, nvm. i guess i set them up right. it's jst that i need the right java O_o

item.title: I wouldapreciate help with setting envirment variables or w/e u call em
item.dc:creator: @WhiteWolves WhiteWolves
item.description:
@WhiteWolves wrote:

hey,
i uninstalled java some time ago an never had a need for installing it again until now.
i’m bored and i feel like running a server for a while.
anyways,
i went on java’s site and got confused,
i ended up downloading some thing “netbeans” some java thing… lol
and whenever i try to comipe the server it says “please install java”
and i thought i did O_o i got netbeans from java…
w/e if someone can just tell me which one to install,
i’d be pretty happy indeed :]
oh yea, and about the variables…
well, nvm. i guess i set them up right. it’s jst that i need the right java O_o
